TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供可以在屬性方格中選取屬性影像的使用者介面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting an image for a property in a property grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，提供使用者介面，讓使用者選取映像的屬性。An is a that provides a user interface for the user to select an image for a property. 當使用者啟動編輯器時，它會顯示**開啟檔案**對話方塊，好讓使用者瀏覽至目錄，並選取檔案。When the user starts the editor, it displays an **Open File** dialog box that enables the user to navigate to a directory and select a file. 預設檔案名稱副檔名的編輯器一開始篩選檔案清單。The file list is initially filtered by the default file name extensions for the editor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用產生關聯與屬性。The following code example uses an to associate the with a property. [!code-cpp[EditorAttributesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CPP/class1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[EditorAttributesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CS/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[EditorAttributesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/VB/class1.vb#3)]

permission.span: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: for access to unmanaged code.

summary.span: 使用指定的副檔名陣列和指定的分隔符號來建立副檔名的字串。

span.span: Creates a string of file name extensions using the specified array of file extensions and the specified separator.

returns.span: 字串，含有指定的副檔名，每個副檔名以指定的分隔符號區隔。

span.span: A string containing the specified file name extensions, each separated by the specified separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的擴充功能表示開啟檔案對話方塊中的檔案類型，依預設篩選檔案清單。The specified extensions indicate the file types for the open file dialog box to filter the file list for by default.
